name: Night Raveler and the Heartbroken Uruguayans 2020
name_original: Night Raveler and the Heartbroken Uruguayans 2020
description:
A remake of a game I made a while ago, where you can cut the bonds between people to cause tragedies or happiness.

Music by Hernan Rozenwasser.

Hint: there are two official endings. I recommend you start by trying to make everyone happy.
